original_body_lines: 'Beyond the Struggle' movement convenor, Balangoda Kassapa Thera, and the other members and friends and prelates staged a protest in front of the Canadian High Commission of, condemning the statement made by the Canadian Premier Minister Justin Trudeau on May 18. Premier Trudeau said May 18 is a day of the Tamil genocide, and thousands of Tamils lost their lives 14 years ago. The Mullivaikkal killings are examples of that. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
